headers.value: default-src 'self'; img-src * data: blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com data:; frame-src 'self' https://drive.google.com https://*.google.com https://www.youtube.com https://youtube.com https://*.youtube.com https://player.vimeo.com; connect-src 'self';
